roleset.name: be in a certain place
roleset.note: OCCUPY-V NOTES: Member of Vncls amuse-31.1. (from occupy.01-v)
OCCUPATION-N NOTES: Updated by Julia. Member of Vncls amuse-31.1. (from occupation.01-n)

example.name: straightforward
example.text: In addition to the new mainframe hardware and software, IBM announced a magnetic-tape system for data storage that it said *trace* occupies half as much floor space as older systems but can store five times as much data on a single cartridge.
example.arg: half as much floor space as older systems

example.name: botched syntax
example.text: Mattel has purchased a new headquarters building in El Segundo, Calif., which it will occupy *trace* by the end of next year.
example.arg: by the end of next year

example.name: with arg2
example.text: John occupies himself every day by creating sentient life forms from Play-Doh.
example.arg: by creating sentient life forms from Play-Doh

example.name: autogen1
example.text: their 19-day occupation of a metal shop at a Peugeot S.A. factoryin eastern France
example.arg: of a metal shop at a Peugeot S.A. factory in eastern France

example.name: args 0 & 1
example.text: the foreign military occupation of that country

example.name: with arg2
example.text: he missed the bell in his occupation with the computer game
